respStmt.name: Craig A. Berry, Martin Mueller, and Clifford Wulfman
Lawrence Berland, Hilary Bina, Katherine Gould, Kreg Segal, Nicholas Terrell

publicationStmt.p: The WordHoard Shakespeare is a joint project of the Perseus Project at Tufts University, The Northwestern University Library, and Northwestern University Academic Technologies. It is derived from The Globe Shakespeare , the one-volume version of the Cambridge Shakespeare , edited by W. G. Clark, J. Glover, and W. A. Wright (1891-3). The Internet Shakespeare editions of the quartos and folios have been consulted to create a modern text that observes as closely as possible the morphological and prosodic practices of the earliest editions. Spellings, especially of contracted and hyphenated forms, have been standardized across the corpus. The text has been fully lemmatized and morphosyntactically tagged.

Â© 2003. The copyright to The WordHoard Shakespeare is owned jointly by Northwestern University and Tufts University. The WordHoard Shakespeare is provided for free solely for non-commercial use by students, scholars, and the public. Any commercial use or publication of it, in whole or in part, without prior written authorization of the copyright holders is strictly prohibited.

sourceDesc.p: The Wordhoard Shakespeare is derived from, but not identical with, The Globe Shakespeare , the one-volume version of the Cambridge Shakespeare (1891-3) edited by W. G. Clark, J. Glover, and W. A. Wright.

castItem.roleDesc: his brother, the usurping Duke of Milan
son to the King of Naples
Nymphs, Reapers, and Other Spirits attending on Prospero

div.head: Act 1, Scene 1
div.stage: On a ship at sea: a tempestuous noise of thunder and lightning heard.
Enter a Ship-Master and a Boatswain.

sp.speaker: Boatswain
sp.stage: Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, FERDINAND, GONZALO, and others.

div.head: Act 1, Scene 2
div.stage: Re-enter ARIEL, invisible, playing and singing; FERDINAND following.

l.stage: Draws, and is charmed from moving.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO, ADRIAN, FRANCISCO, and others.

sp.speaker: Gonzalo
sp.stage: Enter ARIEL, invisible, playing solemn music.

sp.speaker: Antonio
sp.stage: All sleep except Alon., Seb., and Ant.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 2
div.stage: Enter CALIBAN with a burden of food.

sp.speaker: Trinculo
sp.stage: Enter STEPHANO, singing: a bottle in his hand.

l.stage: Enter MIRANDA; and PROSPERO at a distance, unseen.

sp.speaker: Caliban
sp.stage: Ariel plays the tune on a tabor and pipe.

div.head: Act 3, Scene 3
div.stage: Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO, ADRIAN, FRANCISCO, and others.

sp.speaker: Gonzalo
sp.stage: Enter PROSPERO above, invisible. Enter several strange Shapes, bringing in a banquet; they dance about it with gentle actions of salutation; and, inviting the King, c., to eat, they depart.

l.stage: Enter ARIEL, like a harpy, claps his wings upon the table; and, with a quaint device, the banquet vanishes.
Alon., Seb. c. draw their swords.
then, to soft music. Enter the Shapes again,
and dance, with mocks and mows, and carrying out the table.
Juno and Ceres whisper, and send Iris on employment.
they join with the Nymphs in a graceful dance; towards the end whereof PROSPERO starts suddenly, and speaks; after which, to a strange, hollow, and confused noise, they heavily vanish.
Re-enter ARIEL, loaden with glistering apparel, c.
Enter CALIBAN, STEPHANO, and TRINCULO, all wet.

sp.speaker: Stephano
sp.stage: Enter divers Spirits, in shape of dogs and hounds, and hunt them about, PROSPERO and ARIEL setting them on.

l.stage: Cal., Ste., and Trin. are driven out.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter PROSPERO in his magic robes, and ARIEL.

l.stage: Re-enter ARIEL before: then ALONSO, with a frantic gesture, attended by GONZALO; SEBASTIAN and ANTONIO in like manner, attended by ADRIAN and FRANCISCO: they all enter the circle which PROSPERO had made, and there stand charmed; which PROSPERO observing, speaks:
ARIEL sings and helps to attire him.
Here Prospero discovers FERDINAND and MIRANDA playing at chess.
Re-enter ARIEL, with the Master and Boatswain amazedly following.
Re-enter ARIEL, driving in CALIBAN, STEPHANO and TRINCULO, in their stolen apparel.
